meta_description: Examples of using cranberry jam in a sentence and their translations. Creamy cream cheese and cranberry jam make the nutty muffins beautifully festive. - Kremowy ser śmietankowy i dżem żurawinowy sprawiają, że orzechowe babeczki są pięknie świąteczne.
title: CRANBERRY JAM - Translation in Polish
content: There, too, I admired, though I did not gather, the cranberries , small waxen gems, pendants of the meadow grass, pearly and red, which the farmer plucks with an ugly rake, leaving the smooth meadow in a snarl, heedlessly measuring them by the bushel and the dollar only, and sells the spoils of the meads to Boston and New York; destined to beto satisfy the tastes of lovers of Nature there.
sub_category: Orzechy, nasiona, zboża, warzywa i owoce (przetworzone i nie)
